# Website Specification Sheet
**Generated by ThemeGen** | 12/16/2025  
**Theme Name:** Custom Theme

---

## 1. Project Overview

**Project Name:** Pangolin OSS Lakehouse Catalog

**Description:** Pangolin is OSS Lakehouse Catalog in Rust created by Alex Merced as a passion project. If looking for a production grade community run lakehouse checkout [Apache Polaris](https://polaris.apache.org/) and if you looking for a Managed version of Polaris with a built-in semantic layer, federated queries, built-in ai agent and autonomous optimization checkout [Dremio Cloud](https://drmevn.fyi/am-get-started). Contributions are welcomes, and I do hope you take this catalog out for a spin but do keep in mind this is a passion project and I do not have the time to address all issues or feature requests.

If using Dremio and/of Apache Iceberg also check out a few python libraries I created in the forms of Dremioframe and Iceframe

For community discussions, join the #pangolin-catalog channel on the Data Lakehouse Hub slack workspace which you can join at DataLakehouseHub.com

**Target Audience:** Apache Iceberg Data Lakehouse Enthusiasts

**Key Objectives:**
- Define what is Pangolin and its features
- Display photos of UI
- Link back to documentation on github

## 2. Design System

### Color Palette
| Color Role | Hex Code | Usage |
|------------|----------|-------|
| Primary | `#df8d53` | Main brand color, primary buttons, headers |
| Secondary | `#53a5df` | Secondary actions, accents |
| Accent | `#ac5a20` | Highlights, call-to-action elements |
| Background | `#ffffff` | Page background |
| Surface | `#f4f2f1` | Cards, containers, elevated surfaces |
| Text | `#000000` | Body text, headings |

**Color Usage Guidelines:**
- Use Primary color for main CTAs and navigation highlights
- Use Secondary color for supporting elements
- Use Accent color sparingly for important highlights
- Maintain WCAG AA contrast ratios (minimum 4.5:1 for text)

### Typography
**Heading Font:** Open Sans
- Usage: All headings (H1-H6), hero text, section titles

**Body Font:** Mukta
- Usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, navigation, buttons

**Type Scale:** 1.25 (Major Third)

**Font Sizes:**
```css
--text-xs: 0.64rem;
--text-sm: 0.8rem;
--text-base: 1rem;
--text-lg: 1.25rem;
--text-xl: 1.563rem;
--text-2xl: 1.953rem;
--text-3xl: 2.441rem;
--text-4xl: 3.052rem;
```
